title: Check if User is logged in
description: Checks if User is logged into the system by validating the session ID.
name: isLoggedIn

examples.title: Success-Response: 200 OK

title: Login
description: Allows User to log into the system if he/she is authenticated and authorised.
name: login

examples.title: Success-Response: 200 OK

title: Logout
description: Logs user out of the system. User is recognised by his/her session ID.
name: logout

examples.title: Success-Response 200
examples.content:
CALL /rest/problem/p_planner_yap_2017_06_06/services
RETURN problem id: p_planner_yap_2017_06_06 [services ARRAY]

title: Delete record
description: Delete a record of a field array of a problem
name: deleteProblemFieldRecord

title: Get record
description: Get a specific record of a field array of a problem
name: getProblemFieldRecord

examples.title: Success-Response 200
examples.content:
CALL /rest/problem/p_planner_2017_08_07/services/2017-08-07_0001
RETURN
{
       id: "2017-08-07_0001",
       name: "Rolando Alvarez",
       type: "delivery",
       size: [30],
       address: {
               id: "238959",
               postal: "238959",
               name: "Rolando Alvarez",
               address: "sample Address",
               lat: 1.293928897,
               lon: 103.8416786
       },
       service_duration: 300,
       time_window: {
               start: "2017-08-07T14:00+08:00",
               end: "2017-08-07T16:00+08:00"
       },
       allowed_vehicles: [""],
       status: 1,
       priority: 1
   }

Parameter.description: Primary key value of instance to delete (separated by comma)

title: Get all abstract problems
description: Get all abstract problems (containing only selected fields) belong to user authenticated in current session.
name: problem_abstract

Success 200.description: Coordinate type. Could be either "REAL" (real lat/lng coordinates) or "2D" (any float numbers)
Numbers of Orders (service + shipment) exists in problem

title: Geocode Problem
description: Gecode all addresses in a problem (query lat/lng using a specific map service provider)
name: geocodeProblem

title: Optimize Problem
description: Optimise delivery route for selected orders and vehicles using vrp-engine.

Request Body.description: Map service to measure travel time and distance(DO NOT CHANGE)
Solution to be saved or not(DO NOT CHANGE)
Type of id of vehicle (reference to id of vehicle_types)
Earliest start time of this vehicle (in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mmZ format or UTC)
Latest return time of this vehicle (in yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mmZ format or UTC)
Whether vehicle needs to return to depot
Time window (in mm/dd/yy hh:mm format or UTC)

Success 200.description: id of vehicle (reference to id of vehicles section)
Sequence of jobs to be delivered or picked up
Id of Job (reference to id of services
Travel distance from previous location to current one
Travel Time from previous location to current one

name: optimizeProblem

Request Body.description: Latitude and Longitude array of locations to be visited. As in example: 4 locations will be visited A1, A2, A3 and A4. Their coordinates are provided

Success 200.description: Duration and distance travel for travel between waypoints. As in example: Travel duration and distance from A1 A2 A3 A4 are returned.

Encoded string of Geometry of driving route. Encoding/Decoding algorithm is as follows: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/utilities/polylinealgorithm .URL to test decoded and encoded routes: https://google-developers.appspot.com/maps/documentation/utilities/polyline-utility/polylineutility
Total duration (in seconds) of the trip: from A1 to A2 to A3 to A4
